entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Joliette
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning except zero over northern sections.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Freezing rain over northern sections. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning except zero over northern sections. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
